comprehensive_overview: VPL (Visual Programming Language) is a software tool that allows users to create programs by manipulating graphical elements rather than by specifying them textually. It provides a visual interface for programming tasks, making it easier for beginners to understand programming concepts and create functioning code.
core_features:
1. Graphical programming interface
2. Drag-and-drop programming elements
3. Simplified program structuring
4. Visual representation of program flow
5. Real-time feedback and debugging
